snippet: David Plouffe, a top political adviser to President Obama, is scheduled to appear at a West Coast fund-raising meeting Friday for the "super PAC" backing President Obama's re-election bid.
abstract: David Plouffe, a top political adviser to President Obama, is scheduled to appear at a West Coast fund-raising meeting Friday for the "super PAC" backing President Obama's re-election bid.

byline.original: By MICHAEL LUO and NICHOLAS CONFESSORE

headline.main: Top Obama Adviser to Appear at 'Super PAC' Meeting
headline.print_headline: Top Obama Aide Appears At ‘Super PAC’ Event
